content: sock yarn mug cozy materials needed leftover sock yarn fingering weight size 2 5 circular needles 32 inch or dpn s tapestry needle instructions cast on 60 stitches join to work in the round rounds 1-6 *k2 p2* around rounds 7 & on k around until piece measures a little over 3 inches from cast on edge or your desired length decrease round optional k1 k2tog knit to last 3 sts on needle k2tog k1 repeat on other needle i used magic loop method basically you need to decrease a total of 4 sts i decreased this round because my cup is more narrow towards the bottom than the top 56 sts remaining 6 rounds *k2 p2* around bind off loosely weave in ends i did not block my sock cozy pour some yummy coffee or hot tea and enjoy © three birds patterns 2018
